org.gearvrf

Class ZipLoader

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.gearvrf.ZipLoader

  • public abstract class ZipLoader
extends java.lang.Object
    This is a small convenience class that makes it easy to unzip a file and load entries as GVRAndroidResources into the GVRf framework. For cases where the number of files in an applications gets too large to handle, consider zipping them and using the ZipLoader to process them one at a time. The class is flexible enough to allow all types of GVRAndroidResources to be loaded. Note that the ZipLoader makes use of a ZipLoader.ZipEntryProcessor. The ZipLoader.ZipEntryProcessor is a user defined method that is applied to all entries in a zip file.

    • Nested Class Summary

      Nested Classes 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      static interface  ZipLoader.ZipEntryProcessor<T>
      Make use of the ZipLoader.ZipEntryProcessor to process the GVRAndroidResources obtained from the zip file.

    • Method Detail

      • load

        public static <T> java.util.List<T> load(GVRContext gvrContext,
                                         java.lang.String zipFileName,
                                         ZipLoader.ZipEntryProcessor<T> processor)
                                  throws java.io.IOException
        Use this call to load a zip file using the ZipLoader and apply the ZipLoader.ZipEntryProcessor to each entry. The result is a list of all processed entries obtained from the zip file.
        Parameters:
        gvrContext - the GVRf context
        zipFileName - the name of the zip file. This must be a file in the assets folder.
        processor - the ZipLoader.ZipEntryProcessor to be applied to each zip entry in the file.
        Returns:
        a list of processed zip file entries.
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException - this function returns an IOException if there are issues processing the provided zip file.
